content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences or emotions like humans. However, I can provide you with some information on Max Martin and his recent work.

Max Martin continues to be one of the most successful and in-demand producers in the music industry. In recent years, he has worked with a variety of artists, including Taylor Swift, Ariana Grande, and The Weeknd. One of his most recent hits is "Positions" by Ariana Grande, which he produced and co-wrote with her. The song debuted at number one on the Billboard Hot 100 chart and features a catchy and emotional melody, as well as relatable lyrics. Max Martin's ability to connect with audiences through his music has made him a force to be reckoned with in the industry.
